name: Mr. Hart's quest for tea
description:
Mr Hart is a tea enthusiast who wants to leave his apartment building and finish off the day with a nice cup of tea from his local café. This is harder than it seems because a gang called the Coffee Criminals have invaded the building and want to prevent Mr. Hart from drinking tea. Mr Hart has the upper hand though; he has a fully tactical teleporting gun! It is a regular gun that can be used to shoot and kill, but Mr Hart is connected to the gun in such a way that he is teleported to wherever the bullets land! Help Mr Hart use his teleporting gun to escape the complex and and get some lovely soothing  tea!

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The Game Jam theme was "Connected Together". So, my game concept is a top-down roguelike game where the gun and the player are "connected together" in a way that allows the player to teleport with the rounds fired from the teleporting gun.
